title: Did Kenosha's leaders order Cams in the police body and then fail to buy it?
subtitle: None of the responding officers were wearing body cameras at the scene of the incident, where the police shot Jacob Blake several times in August 2020.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Before the police opened fire on Jacob Blake in August 2020, city leaders in Kenosha and Wisconsin passed the city law "require" all officers to wear body cameras but did not buy the equipment.
